name: Siege 2.5D
description:
*EXECUTABLE FILE WORKS NOW*

An indie project prototype. Features Play v Ai and Split Screen. 

Use the breach charge (f) in Play V Ai to destroy the non black walls and windows. 

Play v Ai Controls:

WASD - move

Space - shoot

F - breach charge

C- change camera

Split Screen Controls:

P1: wasd, space, c

P2: arrow keys, mouse 1, right control
